author: jakauppila
body:
We have a few scripts that utilize the credential manager via `Windows.Security.Credentials.PasswordVault`, things worked just fine in 7.0.3 but is now broken in 7.1.0.

https://sites.utexas.edu/glenmark/2019/10/21/using-passwordvault-with-powershell/

## Steps to reproduce

```powershell
[Windows.Security.Credentials.PasswordVault,Windows.Security.Credentials,ContentType=WindowsRuntime]
```

## Expected behavior

```
IsPublic IsSerial Name                                     BaseType
-------- -------- ----                                     --------
True     False    PasswordVault                            System.Runtime.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.RuntimeClass
```

## Actual behavior

```
InvalidOperation: Unable to find type [Windows.Security.Credentials.PasswordVault,Windows.Security.Credentials, ContentType=WindowsRuntime].
```

## Environment data

```
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      7.1.0
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    7.1.0
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.18363
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```

## (Working) Environment data

```
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      7.0.3
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    7.0.3
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.18363
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
It is a breaking change in .Net 5.0 https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/compatibility/3.1-5.0#built-in-support-for-winrt-is-removed-from-net Dup #13042 See PowerShell Committee conclusion https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/13042#issuecomment-655784384
Breaking changes, version 3.1 to 5.0 - .NET Core
Lists the breaking changes from version 3.1 to version 5.0 of .NET, ASP.NET Core, and EF Core.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as duplicate and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: Unable to find type in 7.1.0
